message: This is a fair offer, as it's a 90/10 split in my favor.  Accept it and we can both walk away with a decent amount!
Alice, I understand you want a lion's share, but that offer was too low. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 65/35 split.  Think it over, the clock is ticking!

Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to accept your offer. Let's meet in the middle. I'm proposing an 80/20 split.  Think about it, this is the last chance for a fair deal before inflation eats away at our winnings.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. You're letting greed get in the way of a good deal. I'm dropping my offer to 55/45. Take it before inflation makes this whole thing pointless!
